verses.verse: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning יִרְמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> against the Philistines בְּטֶ֛רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> smote פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> before that Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַזָּֽה׃ <S%H5804><s%> Gaza ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold מַ֜יִם <S%H4325><s%> Behold waters עֹלִ֤ים <S%H5927><s%> rise up מִצָּפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> out of the north וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> and become לְנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> flood שׁוֹטֵ֔ף <S%H7857><s%> and shall be an overflowing וְיִשְׁטְפוּ֙ <S%H7857><s%> and shall overflow אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וּמְלוֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> and all that is therein עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and them that dwell בָ֑הּ וְזָֽעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> shall cry הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> therein then the men וְהֵילִ֕ל <S%H3213><s%> shall howl כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and every יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> and all the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

מִקּ֗וֹל <S%H6963><s%> At the noise שַֽׁעֲטַת֙ <S%H8161><s%> of the stamping פַּרְס֣וֹת <S%H6541><s%> of the hoofs אַבִּירָ֔יו <S%H47><s%> of his strong מֵרַ֣עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> [horses] at the rushing לְרִכְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7393><s%> of his chariots הֲמ֖וֹן <S%H1995><s%> [and at] the rumbling גַּלְגִּלָּ֑יו <S%H1534><s%> of his wheels לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הִפְנ֤וּ <S%H6437><s%> shall not look back אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> the fathers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> to [their] children מֵֽרִפְי֖וֹן <S%H7510><s%> for feebleness יָדָֽיִם׃ <S%H3027><s%> of hands

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> account הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Because of the day הַבָּא֙ <S%H935><s%> that cometh לִשְׁד֣וֹד <S%H7703><s%> to spoil אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> all the Philistines לְהַכְרִ֤ית <S%H3772><s%> [and] to cut off לְצֹר֙ <S%H6865><s%> from Tyrus וּלְצִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> and Zidon כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> Every שָׂרִ֣יד <S%H8300><s%> that remaineth עֹזֵ֑ר <S%H5826><s%> every helper כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is going שֹׁדֵ֤ד <S%H7703><s%> will spoil יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> the Philistines שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant אִ֥י <S%H339><s%> of the country כַפְתּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3731><s%> of Caphtor

בָּ֤אָה <S%H935><s%> is come קָרְחָה֙ <S%H7144><s%> Baldness אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon עַזָּ֔ה <S%H5804><s%> upon Gaza נִדְמְתָ֥ה <S%H1820><s%> is cut off אַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <S%H831><s%> Ashkelon שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> [with] the remnant עִמְקָ֑ם <S%H6010><s%> of their valley עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long מָתַ֖י <S%H4970><s%> How תִּתְגּוֹדָֽדִי׃ <S%H1413><s%> how long wilt thou cut ס

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> O חֶ֚רֶב <S%H2719><s%> thou sword לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> long אָ֖נָה <S%H575><s%> How לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> how long [will it be] ere תִשְׁקֹ֑טִי <S%H8252><s%> thou be quiet הֵאָֽסְפִי֙ <S%H622><s%> ? put up אַל־ <S%H413><s%> into תַּעְרֵ֔ךְ <S%H8593><s%> thyself into thy scabbard הֵרָגְעִ֖י <S%H7280><s%> rest וָדֹֽמִּי׃ <S%H1826><s%> and be still

אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> How תִּשְׁקֹ֔טִי <S%H8252><s%> How can it be quiet וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> seeing the LORD צִוָּה־ <S%H6680><s%> hath given it a charge לָ֑הּ אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and against אַשְׁקְל֛וֹן <S%H831><s%> against Ashkelon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against ח֥וֹף <S%H2348><s%> coast הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> and against the sea שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> in it יְעָדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3259><s%> has assigned ס
